Yakult Australia 确认 95 GB 数据泄露后发生“网络事件” https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/yakult-australia-confirms-cyber-incident-after-95-gb-data-leak/ Wed, 27 Dec 2023 04:10:51 -0500阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/yakult-australia-confirms-cyber-incident-after-95-gb-data-leak/ Yakult Australia, manufacturer of a probiotic milk drink, has confirmed experiencing a "cyber incident" in a statement to BleepingComputer. Both the company's Australian and New Zealand IT systems have been affected. Cybercrime actor DragonForce which claimed responsibility for the attack has also leaked 95 GB of data. [...]
